mapper.sql: id, product_id, product_title, user_id, user_name, mobile, wechat, content, answer, is_delete, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into web_faq
id,
product_id,
product_title,
user_id,
user_name,
mobile,
wechat,
content,
answer,
is_delete,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update web_faq
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_title = #{productTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update web_faq set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_title = #{productTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(id) from web_faq where is_delete = '0'

select
from web_faq where is_delete = '0' order by id DESC limit ${start},${length}
